sense.gloss: volume of water (in a river, pond, flood, etc.)
to mount up, to pile up, to accumulate, to increase
to be bulky, to be unwieldy, to grow voluminous
increasing (a budget, fees, etc.), raising, inflating (figures), padding (an expense account, bill, etc.)
to be highhanded, to be arrogant, to be overbearing

sdata.j: ↑箱↑↓はこ↓のまま↑持↑↓も↓ってくると↑嵩張↑↓かさば↓るから、↑袋↑↓ふくろ↓に↑入↑↓い↓れ↑替↑↓か↓えて↑持↑↓も↓ってきたんだ。
sdata.e: The box was too big and awkward, so I put these in a bag and brought them.

sdata.j: ↑布団↑↓ふとん↓は↑嵩張↑↓かさば↓るので、↑客↑↓きゃく↓↑布団↑↓ぶとん↓など↑使用↑↓しよう↓↑頻度↑↓ひんど↓の↑低↑↓ひく↓い↑布団↑↓ふとん↓は、↑圧縮↑↓あっしゅく↓↑袋↑↓ぶくろ↓に↑入↑↓い↓れて↑圧縮↑↓あっしゅく↓して↑保管↑↓ほかん↓するのもいいでしょう。
sdata.e: Since futons are bulky, it's a good idea to compress and store futons that are used infrequently, such as guest futons, in a vacuum-sealed storage bag.

words.gloss: volume of water (in a river, pond, flood, etc.)
to mount up, to pile up, to accumulate, to increase
